channel.title: The epic failure at the GDC awards
channel.description: So, I, hopefully, one of many spent 2 and a half hours watching this really lame awards show just to see the announcment that was *supposed* to happen during the Pioneer award. As soon as Gabe got to where he was going to make the announcment, the system crashed, the audience cheered and clapped, and we were left clueless. So im placing this here for any venting of this, some people to blame. Or just completely talk about how bad the whole thing was.

item.title: The epic failure at the GDC awards
item.dc:creator: AntiBeast
item.description:
brokenfridgehinge:

Except bluescreen wasn’t real.

I believe you meant to say “The blue screen is a lie”
iz k. it happens.

item.dc:creator: Acristoff

xalener:

What other 09 game came out did anything better?

Red Faction had more impressive technology, and I know you could say that the graphics for UC2 could be considered amazing technology but they have an award for just that.

item.title: The epic failure at the GDC awards
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
I still have my 900HA that I bought from a store that’s not even in business anymore, that thing has more scratch marks than my PSP or phone, it went through 2 batteries and 3 hard drives, still works like a charm.

I finished hl2 and episode 1 on it. Avg 12 FPS. :freeman:

Read full topic

item.title: The epic failure at the GDC awards
item.dc:creator: Muhb
item.description:
sersoft:

Breaking News! Valve is now endorsing ASUS with their public statement in favor of the EEE PC.

The EEE PC was the first thing that ran through my mind after seeing the secret message. E3 was just too obvious an answer. You could actually be on to something there…!

Read full topic

item.source: The epic failure at the GDC awards

item.title: The epic failure at the GDC awards
item.dc:creator: HL2EpThree
item.description:
It wasn’t a failure guys it’s a joke for making us more excited than we already are! Don’t you see it? the morse codes, decoded images, it was all for making us excited about Portal 2 or HL2 Ep3. And don’t be upset with Valve, they gave us the best game of the decade and we love their games, so don’t worry everything its going to be all right, Valve it’s going to make an amazing game like they always do.

Read full topic

item.title: The epic failure at the GDC awards
item.dc:creator: chrisp
item.description:
mental2k:

Are valve going to E3, last time I checked this they weren’t on the list
—> https://www.e3expo.com/exhibitors/92/exhibitor-list/

For some reason Valve usually avoid having themselves listed on the E3 list either by having it appear quite close to the event’s start date or I think they have gone under their retail publishers name before (was Vivendi but in this case it would be EA).

Read full topic
